snippet: Questions are being raised over Chrysler’s response to a recall of the Jeep Liberty and Grand Cherokee because of a rear-impact fire hazard.  The company plans to install a trailer hitch, but safety experts say that won’t solve the problem.
abstract: Questions are being raised over Chrysler’s response to recall of the Jeep Liberty and Grand Cherokee due to rear-impact fire hazard; company plans to install a trailer hitch, which it says will protect gas tank, but safety experts say that will not solve the problem.
lead_paragraph: Questions are being raised over Chrysler’s response to a recall of the Jeep Liberty and Grand Cherokee because of a rear-impact fire hazard.  The company plans to install a trailer hitch, but safety experts say that won’t solve the problem.

headline.main: Chrysler’s Solution for Jeep Recall Runs Into Resistance
headline.print_headline: Chrysler’s Solution for Jeep Recall Runs Into Resistance
